TrueGamer.bio: I'm honestly the best, it's not even close. You should probably just uninstall tbh.

posts.title: Unbelievable
posts.caption: MRW there's a Yasuo midlane on my team. I just KNOW homie's aboutta run it down mid as soon as he instalocks. Players like that are why I'm hardstuck bronze.

posts.title: Day Dreamin...
posts.caption: Ugh I can't wait to be a pro gamer one day. I bet OPTIC is scouting me rn tbh, I should probably just drop out of school rn so that I can focus on my career.

posts.title: #BattleStation
posts.caption: man I can't wait to get out of 5th grade so that I can get a job and FINALLY save up for a PC like this, I wish mom and dad weren't so mean and would just buy it for me already! Maybe I'll ask santa this year...
